mapper.sql: SELECT id, user_id, type, third_id, num, name, image, c_time, m_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO viewol.user_browse ( user_id, type, third_id, num, name, image, c_time, m_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{type}, #{thirdId}, 1, #{name}, #{image}, #{cTime}, #{mTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE num = num + 1 , m_time=now();
